question.body: A person who recently shaved, may not feel an ant crawling on hisor her skin because:

multiple_choice.choice: The lamellated corpuscles were damaged by the razor.
The hair root plexus are not being stimulated.
The Merkel discs are not being stimulated.
The tactile corpuscles were damaged by the razor.

response.feedback: Incorrect. The lamellated corpuscles are located in the dermis and would only be damaged if the razor cut deeply.
Correct. By shaving the hair, the hair root plexus are not stimulated.
Incorrect. Merkel discs are located more on the fingertips and are not affected by the razor.
Incorrect. The tactile corpuscles are located in the dermis and hypodermis, so a razor cut would have to be very deep to affect them.
